entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pass callback from host to runtime for getting properties from the host #77458
    8.0.0
  • Host work in .NET 8 #77456
    8.0.0
  • NativeAot produces warning for generic instantiation which can't be suppressed #77455
  • FileInfo.CreateText and FileInfo.AppendText don't invalidate cache #77453
  • GC Infrastructure Improvements #77452
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failure "GlobalizationMode.UseNls" in CalendarData.GetTwoDigitYearMax #77451
  • [pgo] Assertion failed '((-slop) <= diff) && (diff <= slop)' during 'Compute edge weights (2, false)' #77450
  • [wasm] ILLinker `InvalidOperationException` on perf pipeline #77444
    8.0.0
  • snap: dotnet-sdk 7.0: Output console program crash during dynamic linker if target net7.0 (snap specific) #77442
  • snap: dotnet-runtime-60: Console program crash during dynamic linker due to "librt.so.1: undefined symbol: __clock_nanosleep" #77440
  • NRE in Networking Telemetry EventSources #77434
  • Support ARM64 Windows Hosted Cross-Platform Debugging Services Binaries #77433
    8.0.0
  • The mscordbi.dll is missing from symbol servers #77432
  • NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() on Android leads to FileNotFoundException #77441
  • [jit-cfg] Runtime_73681 FileCheck fails #77430
    8.0.0
  • Array.Initialize should be marked with RequiresUnreferenceCode #77426
    Future
  • JsonNode is not thread safe #77421

Closed

  • make GC's PAL implementation include the right dump info #77184
    8.0.0
  • JIT: suboptimal block layout #76872
    Future
  • JIT optimization: tail merge #8795
    Future
  • JIT: Generating rep movsb for cpblk with non-constant arguments #6464
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for custom JSON deserialization error messages to System.Text.Json #76149
  • .NET RC 2: EnableLLVM=true causes exception in MAUI app on Android #77319
    7.0.x
  • Mono: devirtualize sealed calls #33015
    8.0.0
  • DynamicRevocationTests fails on macOS 13 #77408
  • [mono] FullAOT runtime test failures: condition `i < mcount' not met #57512
    8.0.0
  • SPMI does not cleanly record/replay NAOT compilations #76925
    8.0.0
  • [Question]Is there a sample for tracking the http request time? #67518
    7.0.0
  • JsonWriterHelper.Transcoding.cs replacement #75779
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Question about COMDAT and exception handling #77396
  • Enable regions with NativeAOT #65470
    8.0.0
  • Optimize ASP.NET Core deployment size #77424

PullRequests

Created

  • Add compiler-generated code tests for NativeAot #77457
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm] browser profiler #77449
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #77448
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Avoiding printing twice variable live range #77447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add LLVM documentation. #77445
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Disable SIMD intrinsics for Vector128/64 on Arm64 #77443
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 7.0.x
  • Extending variable live ranges in more cases #77439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77438
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [release/7.0] Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77437
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Add README.md to System.Text.Json #77435
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Avoid running SPMI pipelines on JIT-EE GUID change #77431
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to build multiple variants SxS #77427
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix AV in host from tracing on exit #77425
    area-Host
  • Add README docs for collection libraries #77422
    area-System.Collections, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Implement Array.Initialize in C# #77336
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • statically linking GC PAL on linux #76985
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add runtime-coreclr pgostress pipeline definition #77446
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add readme files to the globalization libraries #77436
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • JIT: implement tail merging #77103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Disable SIMD intrinsics for Vector128/64 on Arm64 #77406
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • README for extensions libraries #77413
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Move usages of `COMPlus_` var to `DOTNET_` fallback #77239
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold static readonly struct X = <zero> to a jit-time const, e.g. Guid.Empty #77354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix OCSP test responder to omit fractional seconds #77411
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Enable multi-reg `LONG` nodes on 32 bit #76263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix documentation for INumberBase IsComplex and IsImaginary #77330
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT runtime generic methods test #77079
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • SPMI: Implement missing NAOT support (and fix garbage values passed to JIT in expandRawHandleIntrinsic) #76996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add startIndex argument to getStringLiteral JIT/EE interface method #77423
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Removed duplicate conditional compilation(#ifndef) #77428
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove custom Utf8 encoder implementation #77400
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Avoid checking for exceptions after calls to Math icalls. #77347
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome for testing #77133
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add null check before calling Path.GetFullPath #76696
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consolidate the `GUID` to string logic #77394
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono] Initial support for unloadable ALCs #77399
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [wasm] Run debugger tests with one work item per test class #77417
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • Adding Readme.md for DirectoryServices.Protocols and Regex libraries #77418
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Move linker to runtime #77149
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove bash dependency from init-compiler #77304
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fold full-width SIMD-typed indirections #76745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Alternative approach to issue 47202 #77370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Removing empty variable live ranges when possible #77289
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - More replacement sequences for integer multiplication by a constant #77137
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] x86/x64 - improved localloc codegen in some cases #76851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add {Last}IndexOfAny{Except}InRange #76803
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Fix typo in docs of AdvSimd.Arm64.TransposeOdd #76971
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Use u8 in Utf8Formatter date formatting #77395
    area-System.Buffers
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Template nits 2 #77263
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Switch CoreCLR WeakReference to unified managed implementation #77196
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Add `IMemoryView` as exported type #77397
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate a nearly empty file #77187
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #77260
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 6.0.12
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add README docs for XML libraries #77401
    area-System.Xml, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix process aborts when using cryptographic primitives with empty input for Android #77283
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Always generate metadata for dynamic methods #77322
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.12
  • [release/7.0] Revert "Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream." #77382
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Console, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fix regression when serializing untyped polymorphic root-level custom converters. #77388
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.1
  • Slightly improve string unrolling for length 5 and 6 #77398
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification #77386
    area-System.Net.Security
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection: allow non-ASCII Passwords on Linux Systems #77223
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Adding EVEX encoding logic for RR/AM pathways #77419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior; Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Ignore ERROR_PIPE_NOT_CONNECTED in WindowsConsoleStream.Write #75734
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAny{Except}InRange in RegexCompiler / source generator #76859
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, blocked, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • #76881 internal properties in GetRuntimeProperties are not shown #77169
  • [build] Enable CodeQL with TSA #76751
  • [Android] Set target SDK version to 31 in AndroidAppBuilder #76461
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Prefer OutputRid over PackageRID for output artifacts. #76871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix unzipping 4GB+ zip files #77181
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Lazily instantiate JsonSerializerOptions.Converters #77219
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Lazy init of [JSExport] bindings #77293
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Detect specifical character in EnumConverter.cs #76873
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Implement Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77355
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Clean up converter initialization logic. #77290
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Handle GT_IND in optVNConstantPropCurStmt #77105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Fix triple slash documentation for System.Runtime.Intrinsics #76687
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flaw in 8.0 runtime workloads authoring caught in packs test #28759
  • Restore solution fails when multiple projects in same directory #28763

Closed

  • Merge templating repo into SDK to simplify repo graph and merge runtime/system.commandline/nuget dependencies #23385
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • add console message for package validation success or failure #28769
    Area-ApiCompat, DO NOT MERGE
  • [DRAFT] Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28749
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-dotnet new
  • Add unit tests for reserved aliases and host specific template data #28748

Merged

  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #28333
    Area-Tools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2029031 #28689
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cherry pick fix parsing for arguments ending with dll/exe (#28662) #28751

Updated

  • Ensure workload installers can be read by other users #28608
    needs team triage, Area-Workloads
  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add RidSpecific, Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce PublishSelfContained #28714
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use implicit package reference for ILC build package #28690
    Area-ILLink
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: add yield for Stream #6593

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: `Task<T>` nullability covariance #3950
    Working Set
  • Championed: Target-typed implicit array creation expression `new[]` #2701
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Flow `scoped` in anonymous function conversion" #6595

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The `RefKind` of implicitly-typed lambda parameters should always be `RefKind.None` #64985
  • Anonymous function conversions with incompatible `scoped` differences should not exist #64984
    17.5
  • MSRC support for 74331 and 74087 #64982
    17.5
  • CodeFix provider does not show up #64975
  • System.AccessViolationException in Symbol.ToDisplayString #64973
  • Keywords in the completion list: foreach as a keyword and as a snippet? #64967
  • inheritdoc tooltips do not display typeparamref correctly #64965
  • Warning CS4014 not triggered on async methods behind an interface within an Action or Func<> #64964
  • How can I diagnose the problem of growing working set memory #64962

Closed

  • Missing CS0238 error for private static interface members #64871
    17.5
  • Analyzer incorrectly proposes removal of unnecessary cast. #28867
    Backlog
  • Intellisense lambda backspace issue #28921
    Backlog
  • Quick actions create duplicate region blocks #22881
    Backlog
  • Undo granularity for completion is too coarse #28251
    Backlog
  • The compiler should report an error about references to out-of-scope stack memory generated by `[UnscopedRef]` and defensively copied struct. #64776
    17.5
  • C#11 Required override non-nullable properties can't initialize #64920

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix test flakeyness #64989
    Area-IDE
  • Make instructions for STE a live region for screen readers #64988
    Area-IDE
  • add validation for powershell scripts in CI #64987
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Scoped implicitly-typed lambda parameters (#64680)" #64986
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Removed "sealed" from base class #64983
    Area-IDE
  • Extract name recommendation logic into a separate type #64981
    Area-IDE
  • Doc IAttributeOperation change #64980
    Area-Compilers
  • REmove complex diagnostic options and options changing reentrancy #64979
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Use a more consistent pattern for updating the solution in a WOrkspace" #64978
    Area-IDE
  • Check escape after converting #64976
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve generate-method result with multiple potential overloads #64974
    Area-IDE
  • Don't directly reenter back into the workpsace when initializing listeners #64971
    Area-IDE
  • Don't directly reenter back into the workpsace when initializing listeners. #64969
    Area-IDE
  • Consistently extract synthesized delegate info from method symbol #64966
  • Disallow default parameter values in anonymous method expressions #64963
    Area-Compilers
  • Add lambda `params` mismatch error #64961
    Area-Compilers
  • Report structural lambda `params` errors #64960
    Area-Compilers
  • Upload xunit results as an attachment from helix #64957
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Cleanup VS reference manager a bit #64944
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Inline Hints - Fix bug where hints swap #64968
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add tests to demonstrate issue no longer reproes #64972
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64876
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #64958
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64956
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Reverting Code Index ingestion #64946
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, Next
  • Fix issue with inline-declaration messing up preceding trivia #64970
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add highly parallel test to ensure pinning/syncing/streaming results is safe. #64951
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove project-cache-service #64880
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow and emit `params` arrays in lambdas #64861
    Area-Compilers
  • fix incorrect variable name #63663
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Ref safety analysis should take into consideration defensive copy of a call receiver performed by IL gen. #64890
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #64959
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #64955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #64954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64991
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove net50 ref assemblies #64833
    Area-Compilers
  • Foreach ref assignment without identity conversion should give error #64879
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add A/B flag to test removing recoverable assembly-metadata in VS. #64948
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Read required project properties from evaluation data"" #64892
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64874
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Suppress IOperation validation for lambda parameter initializers #64630
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 17.4 version to preview 6 #64953
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Incremental Generators docs update #63500
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community
  • Avoid writing `CDATA` to generated targets file #64334
    Area-Compilers
  • Report obsolete diagnostics for types named var/unmanaged/notnull #64717
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Track local constant usage in attributes applied to local methods or lambdas #64773
    Area-Compilers
  • Use -Svc pool providers for release/ branch builds #64950
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Swashbuckle and also NSwag error with "no operations defined in spec" in a complex application #44733
  • mvc F# template: conditions defined in the templates are not correct #44729
  • Hype up Kestrel overview page in documentation #44725
  • JwtBearerHandler should check Authority & Issuer before trying to validate #44724
  • Optimize ASP.NET Core publish size #44721

Closed

  • OpenApiReference add support for yaml #25351
    .NET 8 Planning
  • (Blazor) Navigating to a non-existing page does not call Dispose() on IDisposable component #44539
    .NET 8 Planning
  • PWA Blazor doesn't work when I use Multiple hosted ASP.NET Core Blazor WebAssembly apps #44164
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Consider using the server culture in Blazor WebAssembly Hosted application #38767
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Huge blazorpack bytes buffer when using Blazor Virtualize component #44727
  • blazor-devserversettings.json #39449
    Backlog
  • dotnet new web profiles should list HTTPS profile before HTTP #44722
  • Have chunk size as parameter for `DotNetStreamReference`. #44673
  • 6.0.10 on Ubuntu 22.10 throws UpdateStatusAfterSocketErrorAndThrowException #44701

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a rule for servicing PR authors to get a notification about who will be merging those PRs #44735
    area-infrastructure
  • Updating SDK version #44734
  • Update BuildFromSource.md #44728
  • [release/2.1] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44720
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Merged

  • Fix the tooltip for the `SupportPagesAndViews` option #44731
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview1
  • Revert "Update SDK" #44730
    8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Backport 'Fix Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView processing the same action multiple times' #44718
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.12
  • Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #44668
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2029449 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • CreatedResult should accept null location #42576
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44719
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Update Grpc.AspNetCore dependency for template #44621
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 3.1.x
  • [release/7.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44717
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Add more granular tests for HeaderUtilities.TryParseQualityDouble #44574
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Support collecting startup traces with dotnet trace #3467

Updated

  • `dotnet-trace` on containers #3480
    8.0.0
  • Correlate EventPipe events with trace spans #3313
    8.0.0
  • dotnet diagnostic tools benchmark tests need investigation #3248
    8.0.0
  • Specify all source-built dependencies and ensure they are regularly updated #3326
    8.0.0
  • Source-build behavior control update #3331
    8.0.0
  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #3341
    8.0.0
  • .netrace show hight CPU usage for System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOneNoCheck #3359
  • Container Config - document seccomp profile needed to ensure .NET apps run #3445
    8.0.0
  • Improve distributed tracing doc #3451
    7.0.0
  • Many dotnet diagnostics tools fail to run on stuck container #2719
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-dump collect process crash. Unable to read beyond the end of the stream. #3401
    8.0.0
  • Timed out when dotnet-trace connects to a dotnet app #3479
    8.0.0
  • !eeheap is reporting slightly inaccurate committed bytes. #3482
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-dump] collect permission issue fails collection with HRESULT: 0x00000000 #3423
    Future

PullRequests

Merged

  • dotnet-monitor: Port stop-on-event infrastructure #3472

Updated

  • Proposed spec for GetProcessInfo3 IPC command #3476

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui Blazor app truncated on Mac #10911
  • Appsettings build error #10908
  • IOS Compiling Error #10907
  • FlexLayout Memory leak #10904
    Backlog
  • R8 : warning : Missing class androidx.window.extensions.WindowExtensions #10901
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid Relative Path Handling #10898
  • Implict style for ContentPage not working #10895
    Backlog
  • OnIdiom not working when using as style resource #10894
  • Shell SearchHandler icon colors and sizes #10893
    Backlog
  • [Windows] System.AccessViolationException when closing window #10887
    Backlog
  • Android GoogleMap IsInfoWindowShown wrong value after InfoWindow is shown #10885
  • [Enhancement] Label Autofit Font #10884
    Backlog
  • iOS app fails to appear - dotnet MAUI "cute bot waving" never appears in iOS Window #10880

Closed
